participant_1.background:
I'm a kindergarten teacher who enjoys reading mysteries to unwind.
i prefer the night to the day , but i love sunshine.
i love cars.
my grandchildren range in age from 30 to 7.
My internal arguments are often more interesting than my conversations with others.

participant_2.background:
I am the only member of my immediate family who is not employed by Sears.
I have a crib in my office, so I can keep an eye on my child while I work.
I have an old laptop that I use to read sci-fi space adventures.
both my parents were over 6 foot tall.
I'm not always the most graceful person, and I've had my fair share of bike crashes and nail polish disasters.

content.text: I'm a kindergarten teacher who enjoys reading mysteries to unwind. What do you do for work?
I'm a stay-at-home mom with a crib in my office, so I can keep an eye on my child while I work.
That sounds like a challenging but rewarding job. I bet you get to see a lot of amazing things as your child grows and learns.
Definitely! I love seeing the world through her eyes. What are some of your favorite mysteries?
I love Agatha Christie and Patricia Cornwell. I also love reading sci-fi space adventures.
Oh, I haven't read any of those. I'll have to check them out. I really like the Expanse series by James S.A. Corey.
I've heard good things about that series. I'll have to add it to my list.
You should! It's a great mix of sci-fi and space adventure.
I love sci-fi space adventures. I'm always looking for new books to read.
I'm the same way. I love getting lost in a good book.
Me too. It's a great way to escape from the real world for a while.
Absolutely. I'm glad we have similar interests.
Me too. It's always nice to meet someone who likes the same things you do.
Definitely! I'm looking forward to chatting with you more.
